title: Science, conferred on him by or under the enactments specified in the Schedule
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Further and Higher Education, Research,
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Further and Higher Education, Research, 

Innovation and Science (Delegation of Ministerial Functions) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited higher education research innovation science (delegation ministerial functions) order 2025

title: Science, conferred on him by or under the enactments specified in the Schedule
heading: 2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of
text_raw:
2. The powers (other than the power to prosecute an offence) and duties of 
the Minister for Further and Higher Education, Research, Innovation and 
Science, conferred on him by or under the enactments specified in the Schedule 
are delegated to Marian Harkin, Minister of State at the Department of Further 
and Higher Education, Research, Innovation and Science. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 13th June, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [272] 3
text_norm: 2 power (other power prosecute offence) duty minister higher education research innovation science conferred enactment specified schedule delegated marian harkin minister state department higher education research innovation science notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 13th june 2025 272 3

title: Science, conferred on him by or under the enactments specified in the Schedule
heading: Industrial Training Act 1967 (No. 5 of 1967)
text_raw:
SCHEDULE 

Industrial Training Act 1967 (No. 5 of 1967) 

Further Education and Training Act 2013 (No. 25 of 2013) (other than section 
6(2), sections 10 to 13 and section 23) 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

10 June, 2025. 

MICHEÁL MARTIN, 

Taoiseach. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [272]
